Package org.ginsim.core.graph.view.style

Interface NodeStyle<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the vertex
    All Superinterfaces:
    Style
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface NodeStyle<V>
extends Style
    Define the visual parameters of a node.
